segment.source: Known Issues in the MBAM International Release
segment.target: Known Issues in the MBAM International Release

segment.source: This section contains known issues for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) International Release.
segment.target: This section contains known issues for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) International Release.

segment.source: Known Issues in the MBAM International Release
segment.target: Known Issues in the MBAM International Release

segment.source: The Installation Process Does Not Specify Update
segment.target: The Installation Process Does Not Specify Update

segment.source: Upon updating the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring server or servers, the Setup program does not state that an update is being installed.
segment.target: Upon updating the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring server or servers, the Setup program does not state that an update is being installed.

segment.source: Certificates Used for the Administration and Monitoring Server Role
segment.target: Certificates Used for the Administration and Monitoring Server Role

segment.source: If you are using a certificate for authentication between MBAM servers, after updating the MBAM Administration and Monitoring server you must ensure that the certificate is valid and not revoked or expired.
segment.target: If you are using a certificate for authentication between MBAM servers, after updating the MBAM Administration and Monitoring server you must ensure that the certificate is valid and not revoked or expired.

segment.source: MBAM Svclog File Filling Disk Space
segment.target: MBAM Svclog File Filling Disk Space

segment.source: If you have followed Knowledge Base article 2668170, http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2668170, you might have to repeat the KB steps after you install this update.
segment.target: If you have followed Knowledge Base article 2668170, http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2668170, you might have to repeat the KB steps after you install this update.

segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
